mapper.sql: a.inv_no, a.wh_id, b.wh_name, a.mat_no, c.mat_name, isnull(a.inv_qty, 0) inv_qty, a.std_qty, isnull(a.wrd_qty, 0) wrd_qty, isnull(a.wsp_qty, 0) wsp_qty, isnull(a.rd_qty, 0) rd_qty, isnull(a.rj_qty, 0) rj_qty, isnull(a.booking_qty, 0) booking_qty, a.cr_user, a.cr_time, a.md_user, a.md_time, e.mat_status, isnull(i.name, e.mat_status) mat_status_dscr, b.dept_id, f.dept_name, b.domain, g.name domain_name, c.catg1_code, d.catg1_name, c.catg2_code, d.catg2_name, c.catg3_code, d.catg3_name, c.ctrl_type, case when c.ctrl_type = 'S' then 1 when e.mat_status = 1 then a.std_qty when e.mat_status = 2 then a.wrd_qty when e.mat_status = 3 then a.wsp_qty end qty, case c.ctrl_type when 'S' then e.tag_no end tag_no, case c.ctrl_type when 'S' then e.ven_sn end ven_sn
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_INV_INV a left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE b on b.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_INV_MATERIAL c on c.mat_no = a.mat_no left join TB_INV_CATEGORY d on d.catg1_code = c.catg1_code and d.catg2_code = c.catg2_code and d.catg3_code = c.catg3_code left join TB_INV_SRL e on e.mat_no = a.mat_no and e.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_ORG_DEPT f on f.dept_id = b.dept_id left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN g on g.id = b.domain left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP i on i.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and i.code = cast(e.mat_status as varchar(50))
order by ${orderByClause}

select a.wh_id, b.wh_name, a.mat_no, c.mat_name, sum(a.booking_qty) booking_qty, b.domain from TB_INV_INV a left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE b on b.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_INV_MATERIAL c on c.mat_no = a.mat_no
group by a.wh_id, b.wh_name, a.mat_no, c.mat_name, b.domain

select
from TB_INV_INV a left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE b on b.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_INV_MATERIAL c on c.mat_no = a.mat_no left join TB_INV_CATEGORY d on d.catg1_code = c.catg1_code and d.catg2_code = c.catg2_code and d.catg3_code = c.catg3_code left join TB_INV_SRL e on e.mat_no = a.mat_no and e.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_ORG_DEPT f on f.dept_id = b.dept_id left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN g on g.id = b.domain left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP i on i.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and i.code = cast(e.mat_status as varchar(50)) where inv_no = #{inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_INV (inv_no, wh_id, mat_no, inv_qty, std_qty, wrd_qty, wsp_qty, rd_qty, rj_qty, booking_qty, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time) values (#{inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into TB_INV_INV
inv_no,
wh_id,
mat_no,
inv_qty,
std_qty,
wrd_qty,
wsp_qty,
rd_qty,
rj_qty,
booking_qty,
cr_user,
cr_time,
md_user,
md_time,
#{inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update TB_INV_INV
inv_no = #{record.inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_qty = #{record.inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
std_qty = #{record.std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wrd_qty = #{record.wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wsp_qty = #{record.wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rd_qty = #{record.rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rj_qty = #{record.rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
booking_qty = #{record.booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update TB_INV_INV set inv_no = #{record.inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inv_qty = #{record.inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, std_qty = #{record.std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wrd_qty = #{record.wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wsp_qty = #{record.wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rd_qty = #{record.rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rj_qty = #{record.rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, booking_qty = #{record.booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update TB_INV_INV
wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_qty = #{inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
std_qty = #{std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wrd_qty = #{wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wsp_qty = #{wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rd_qty = #{rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rj_qty = #{rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
booking_qty = #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where inv_no = #{inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TB_INV_INV set wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inv_qty = #{inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, std_qty = #{std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wrd_qty = #{wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wsp_qty = #{wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rd_qty = #{rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rj_qty = #{rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, booking_qty = #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where inv_no = #{inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TB_INV_INV
wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_qty = #{inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
std_qty = std_qty+#{std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wrd_qty = #{wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wsp_qty = #{wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rd_qty = #{rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rj_qty = #{rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
booking_qty = #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} And wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select a.inv_no, a.wh_id, (select wh_name from TB_INV_WAREHOUSE where wh_id=a.wh_id) wh_name, a.mat_no, (select mat_name from tb_inv_material where mat_no=a.mat_no) mat_name, a.inv_qty, a.std_qty, a.wrd_qty, a.wsp_qty, a.rd_qty, a.rj_qty, a.booking_qty, a.cr_user, a.cr_time, a.md_user, a.md_time,(select ctrl_type from tb_inv_material where mat_no=#{matNo} ) ctrlType from TB_INV_INV a where wh_id=#{wareHouseOut}
and mat_no=#{matNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_INV_INV SET
std_qty = (std_qty-#{presentExportSum})
Wrd_qty = (Wrd_qty - #{presentExportSum})
Wsp_qty = (Wsp_qty-#{presentExportSum})
, booking_qty = (booking_qty-#{presentExportSum})
WHERE mat_no = #{matNo} AND wh_id = #{whId}

UPDATE TB_INV_INV SET
std_qty = (std_qty + #{presentExportSum})
Wrd_qty = (Wrd_qty + #{presentExportSum})
Wsp_qty = (Wsp_qty + #{presentExportSum})
WHERE mat_no = #{matNo} AND wh_id = #{whId}
mapper.select: select a.mat_no ,(select mat_name from tb_inv_material where mat_no=a.mat_no) matName, std_qty qty ,'可用品' 'matStatus' , 1 mat_status,std_qty inv_qty,booking_qty from tb_inv_inv a where wh_id=#{wareHouseOut} and std_qty > 0 union all select a.mat_no ,(select mat_name from tb_inv_material where mat_no=a.mat_no) matName, wrd_qty qty,'待送修' 'matStatus' , 2 mat_status,wrd_qty inv_qty,booking_qty from tb_inv_inv a where wh_id=#{wareHouseOut} and wrd_qty > 0 union all select a.mat_no ,(select mat_name from tb_inv_material where mat_no=a.mat_no) matName, wsp_qty qty ,'待報廢' 'matStatus' , 3 mat_status,wsp_qty inv_qty,booking_qty from tb_inv_inv a where wh_id=#{wareHouseOut} and wsp_qty > 0 order by mat_no,mat_status
mapper.update:
update TB_INV_INV
inv_no = #{record.inv_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_qty = #{record.inv_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
std_qty = #{record.std_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wrd_qty = #{record.wrd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wsp_qty = #{record.wsp_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rd_qty = #{record.rd_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rj_qty = #{record.rj_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
booking_qty = booking_qty+#{record.booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
select a.wh_id, b.wh_name, '' ven_sn, '' tag_no, a.mat_no, c.mat_name, c.ctrl_type, d.catg1_code, d.catg1_name, d.catg2_code, d.catg2_name, d.catg3_code, d.catg3_name, a.std_qty, a.wrd_qty, a.wsp_qty, a.rd_qty, a.rj_qty from TB_INV_INV a left join TB_INV_WAREHOUSE b on b.wh_id = a.wh_id left join TB_INV_MATERIAL c on c.mat_no = a.mat_no left join TB_INV_CATEGORY d on d.catg1_code = c.catg1_code and d.catg2_code = c.catg2_code and d.catg3_code = c.catg3_code left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN g on g.id = b.domain
order by a.wh_id, a.mat_no
